products.title: Mayfair Noir Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Bewitch all who befall your mayfair noir dimout blinds, as their dark glamour creates the ultimate dramatic statement piece. The matt black fabric benefits from extra light and depth created from the shadows of the polyester blind's pleating, giving it a beautifully tactile look. Despite its dark tone, the noir blind is created with dimout fabric to allow light to gently filter through in the daytime, to create a gentle light glow even when the blind is closed for full privacy.
